body_html: @meteorcloudy any thoughts here? I'd really like to avoid having is_external around every contrib cc_library() rule. In theory, couldn't we just default is_external to True and then add it to the _pywrap_tensorflow_internal rule only?
body_text: @meteorcloudy any thoughts here? I'd really like to avoid having is_external around every contrib cc_library() rule. In theory, couldn't we just default is_external to True and then add it to the _pywrap_tensorflow_internal rule only?
body: @meteorcloudy any thoughts here? I'd really like to avoid having `is_external` around every contrib cc_library() rule. In theory, couldn't we just default is_external to True and then add it to the _pywrap_tensorflow_internal rule only?
